# HTTPs Simulator:

## Running
 - Make sure python and pip are installed
 - Install PyCrypto (needed for the sha-256 algorithm): `pip install pycrypto`
 - Execution:
   -  Run on terminal:  `python3 main.py`
   -  The output of each variable will be printed
